StringTable.Label: ColonyCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides the basic needs of a colony.

StringTable.Label: ColonyCapitalUpgrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides the basic needs of a colony.

StringTable.Label: ColonyCapitalUpgrade2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides the basic needs of a colony.

StringTable.Label: InspirationExtractor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Extracts any ideas from colonists willingly or not.

StringTable.Label: TempleOfDespair_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Achievement. Informs the universe that we are back. Recruits a Commander.

StringTable.Label: StrategicCommand_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Galactic Wonder, Produces a General. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: StripMine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Strip mine your world for fun and profit. Mostly profit.

StringTable.Label: YorResearchChamber_ShortDec
StringTable.String: You really don't want to know what this is.

StringTable.Label: YorMainFrame_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to jumpstart our research.

StringTable.Label: YorResourceExtractor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Extracts raw materials from planetary mantle.

StringTable.Label: RareMetalExtractor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Devastates the environment but produces wealth for the colony.

StringTable.Label: ComputerCore_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to jumpstart our research.

StringTable.Label: GalacticMainframe_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a central hub for our research efforts. Cannot be built on homeworld.

StringTable.Label: XenoDeepCoreMine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides raw materials for planetary improvement construction. Can't be built on the homeworld.

StringTable.Label: CentralBank_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides your biggest source of raw economic output.

StringTable.Label: SpaceElevator_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases planetary production by making it easier to get assets into space.

StringTable.Label: IndustrialCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The center of your civilization's manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: SupplyDepot_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Streamlines the distribution of goods and supplies to residents improving morale and productivity.

StringTable.Label: ColonizationCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Registra cidadãos que não foram previamente cadastrados em nossos registros para colonização, aumentando nossa população disponível.

StringTable.Label: TyronsDestiny_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Recruits eager colonists and provides a fully loaded colony ship.

StringTable.Label: BasicFactory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases production for all construction projects

StringTable.Label: XenoFactory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases production for all construction projects

StringTable.Label: MegaFactory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases production for all construction projects

StringTable.Label: ManufacturingCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases production for all construction projects

StringTable.Label: IndustrialSector_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases production for all construction projects

StringTable.Label: FusionPowerPlant_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes factories more efficient, and boosts Production.

StringTable.Label: QuantumPowerPlant_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes factories more efficient, and boosts Production.

StringTable.Label: SingularityPowerPlant_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Give a Production bonus to all planets in your civilization.

StringTable.Label: ManufacturingCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A unique improvement that greatly boosts Production.

StringTable.Label: TechnologicalCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A unique improvement that greatly boosts Research and Influence.

StringTable.Label: InnovationComplex_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes laboratories more efficient, and boosts Research.

StringTable.Label: OmegaResearchCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes laboratories more efficient and boosts Research. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ResearchCloisters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost research, and the foundation of a terrestrial Ascension gate.

StringTable.Label: QuantumResearchFoundation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost research, and makes building a terrestrial Ascension gate possible.

StringTable.Label: AscensionGate_ShortDec
StringTable.String: When completed, allows a race to reach the next plane of existence. Requires Beyond Mortality technology.

StringTable.Label: HyperSpaceProject_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the maximum speed of our ships by 1.

StringTable.Label: EyesOfUniverse_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Locates homeworld of all Hyperdrive capable civilizations. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: BrindlesObservatory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Discovers a nearby habitable planet upon completion.

StringTable.Label: DimensionalObservatory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases our knowledge of the universe. Also improves Hyperlane speed.

StringTable.Label: KimbreysRefuge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Professor Taylor's Uganda growing techniques produce food on an alien world.

StringTable.Label: City_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the population your colony can support. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: SiliconCity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the population your colony can support.

StringTable.Label: FoodDistribution_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes farms more efficient, and boosts the population cap.

StringTable.Label: XenoIrrigation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes farms more efficient, and boosts the population cap.

StringTable.Label: BiomassResequencer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes farms more efficient, and boosts the population cap.

StringTable.Label: ColonialHospital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a planet's population growth rate.

StringTable.Label: XenoMedicalCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a planet's population growth rate.

StringTable.Label: FertilityCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a planet's population growth rate.

StringTable.Label: ReplicationCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a planet's population growth rate.

StringTable.Label: PlanetaryConversion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to turn convert a unproductive tile into a useful one.

StringTable.Label: TerraformingPlant_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Terraform one tile of decent quality.

StringTable.Label: HabitatImprovementPlant_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Terraform one tile of lesser quality.

StringTable.Label: HyperionSensorSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boosts the sensor range of ships built at this planet's shipyard. Gains levels from Military and All Construction. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HyperionLogisticsSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the logistics cost of ships built at this planet's shipyard. Gains levels from Military and All Construction. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HyperionShrinker_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the hull capacity of ships. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HyperionSupplySystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of ships built at this planet's shipyard. Gains levels from Military and All Construction. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: HyperionShipyard_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the hitpoints of ships built at this planet's shipyard. Gains levels from Military and All Construction. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PlanetaryDome_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly Increases the Resistance of a colony. Gains levels from Military and All Construction.

StringTable.Label: MilitaryAcadamyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows training of Legions. Gains levels from Military and All Construction.

StringTable.Label: OrbitalDefensePlatform_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a defending force of assault fighters. Gains levels from Military and All Construction.

StringTable.Label: AdminCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the number of colonies and starbases we can manage. Organizes nearby improvements

StringTable.Label: GalacticIntelligenceAgency_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a Spy upon completion. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Embassy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Facilitates relations with other races and helps spread Influence. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticDistrict_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Facilitates relations with other races and helps spread Influence.

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticMinistry_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Facilitates relations with other races and helps spread Influence.

StringTable.Label: AssimilationFoundation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Influence of all worlds in our civilization. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: CulturalBeacon_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the influence of this planet, allows the training of celebrities and can not be destroyed.

StringTable.Label: GalacticCouncil_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Grants a diplomat and increases the influence of this planet. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Bank_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes economic buildings more efficient, and boosts gross Income.

StringTable.Label: BankingSector_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes economic buildings more efficient, and boosts gross Income.

StringTable.Label: FinancialSector_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes economic buildings more efficient, and boosts gross Income.

StringTable.Label: GalacticStockExchange_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the gross Income of all our worlds. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FinancialCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A unique improvement that greatly boosts Income and Influence. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: TradePost_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Trade Income from trade routes.

StringTable.Label: TradeCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Trade Income from trade routes.

StringTable.Label: CustomsOffice_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Trade Income from trade routes.

StringTable.Label: GalacticBazar_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Trade Income from trade routes across our civilization. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: VirtualVacation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows citizens to experience other worlds from the comfort of their homes.

StringTable.Label: EntertainmentCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A unique improvement that greatly boosts Approval and Influence. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PaxtonsEmporium_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The one-of-a-kind intergalactic trade show will convert a small percentage of every tile of influence you own into tourism income.

StringTable.Label: ImportExport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows visitors from alien worlds to sample the wonders of our civilization.

StringTable.Label: PortofCall_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A small percent of travelers in your influence will visit and spend their money.

StringTable.Label: TouristHaven_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Attract tourists from all over the galaxy to your world.

StringTable.Label: TouristDestination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Build the greatest theme park in the history of the known universe.

StringTable.Label: RestaurantEternity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows you to recruit Entrepreneurs. Converts every tile you own into tourism income.

StringTable.Label: WorkCampKorath_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a colony's Manufacturing. Slaves also live in the camp. Great for getting colonies moving.

StringTable.Label: WorkCamp_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a colony's Manufacturing. Slaves also live in the camp.

StringTable.Label: ForcedLaborCamp_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a colony's Manufacturing. Slaves also live in the camp.

StringTable.String: Increases a colony's Manufacturing. Slaves also live in the camp.

StringTable.Label: DevilsForge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a colony's Manufacturing. Slaves also live in the camp.

StringTable.Label: SlavePit_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a colony's Manufacturing. Gains levels from All Construction and Research.

StringTable.Label: SlaveMill_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a colony's Manufacturing. Gains levels from All Construction and Research.

StringTable.Label: SlaveFactory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a colony's Manufacturing. Gains levels from All Construction and Research.

StringTable.Label: SlaveRecycler_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes farms more efficient and provides more food.

StringTable.Label: ProteinResequencer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes farms more efficient and profides more food.

StringTable.Label: SocialMatrix_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Manufacturing and Research of a world. Gains levels from Research and All Construction.

StringTable.Label: DarkEnergyLab_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Manufacturing and Research of a world.

StringTable.Label: ChampionsTemple_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases military readiness of a world.

StringTable.Label: ShrineoftheMithrilar_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Approval and Influence of a world. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ShrineofTandis_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Approval and Influence on all of your worlds. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FreeMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a worlds wealth and Influence.

StringTable.Label: IridiumStore_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a worlds wealth and Influence.

StringTable.Label: IridiumCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a worlds wealth and Influence.

StringTable.Label: IridiumWorld_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a worlds wealth and Influence.

StringTable.Label: GalacticShowcase_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a world's gross Income and influence. [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Can not be destroyed.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: CoordinationTemple_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Gives Adjacency Bonus to all adjacent Improvements.

StringTable.Label: LaborMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Gives Adjacency Bonus to all adjacent Improvements.

StringTable.Label: LaborOracle_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Gives Adjacency Bonus to all adjacent Improvements.

StringTable.Label: ShadowTemple_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase Diplomatic Relation with other worlds.

StringTable.Label: KrynniacOracle_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a worlds Influence Approval, & Research.

StringTable.String: Increases a worlds Influence Approval, & Tourism.

StringTable.Label: KrynniacSanctuary_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a worlds Influence Approval, & Tourism.

StringTable.Label: ManufactureLife_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the population of the colony.

StringTable.Label: HyperionMatrix_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost the research of all your colonies.

StringTable.Label: XenoAnthropology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost the relations with other races, and helps spread our influence.

StringTable.Label: UniversalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost the relations with other races, and helps spread influence.

StringTable.Label: FutureStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost the relations with other races, and helps spread our influence.

StringTable.Label: MolecularFabricatorc_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a colony's Manufacturing and Research.

StringTable.Label: IndustrialReplicator_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a colony's Manufacturing and Research.

StringTable.Label: DreamConclave_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Morale of all colonies, as well as the Influence and Research rate of its host planet.

StringTable.Label: BirthingPools_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a planet's population growth rate.

StringTable.Label: NavigationCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the moves of all ship.

StringTable.Label: GalacticNavigationNetwork_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the moves of all ship.

StringTable.Label: GalacticNavigatorsGuild_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the moves of all ship.

StringTable.Label: WeatherControlCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a Planet overall by boosting Morale, lowering Maintenance, and increasing Production.

StringTable.Label: WeatherControlZenith_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a Planet overall by boosting Morale, lowering Maintenance, and increasing Production.

StringTable.Label: TempleofValor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a colonies ability to resist invasion.

StringTable.Label: StellarForge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Hit points, and lowers the maintenance of all ship built sponsored shipyard.

StringTable.Label: AntimatterPowerPlant_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly Increases the abilities of all Improvements Adjacent to it, but requires Antimatter to build.

StringTable.Label: MissionaryCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost a planet's influence and generates Benevolent Ideology points.

StringTable.Label: ElevationFoundation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost colony's morale while generating a Benevolent ideology point every 10 turns.

StringTable.Label: TempleofEnlightenment_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the colony's research while generating a Benevolent Ideology point every 5 turns.

StringTable.Label: PreparednessCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boost Planetary Defense and generates 1 Pragmatic Ideology point every 10 turns.

StringTable.Label: ArbitrationCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases tourism and influence on world.

StringTable.Label: IntimidationCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Suppresses malcontents, and generates Malevolent Ideology points.

StringTable.Label: CitadelofRevenue_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly boosts a planet's income, and generates Malevolent Ideology points.

StringTable.Label: DeathFurnace_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the overall production of a world and generates Malevolent Ideology point every 5 turns.

StringTable.Label: AquaticBiospheres1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Terraform any remaining single salvageable tile.

StringTable.Label: AquaticBiospheres2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Terraform any remaining single salvageable tile.

StringTable.Label: AquaticBiospheres3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Terraform any remaining single salvageable tile, on each of your colonies.

StringTable.Label: MonumentResistance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This monument will galvanize the citizens of this world against invaders generating 5 legions of fresh troops.

StringTable.Label: MonumentApproval_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A reminder of those sacrficed for what we have.

StringTable.Label: MonumentSoldiering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A monument to those we have already destroyed. Raises 5 new legions of troops.

StringTable.Label: MonumentProduction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A reminder that our warships are an extension of our spirit.

StringTable.Label: MonumentGlobal_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A monument to Kindar A'Aghohl, who leads us from darkness.

StringTable.Label: RecruitCitizen_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Recruits a new Citizen to your Civilization.

StringTable.Label: RecruitScientist_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Recruits a Scientist for your Civilization.

StringTable.Label: RecruitSpy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Recruits a Spy for your Civilization

StringTable.Label: RecruitEntrepreneur_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Recruits an Entrepreneur for your Civilization.

StringTable.Label: TrainDiplomat_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Recruits a Diplomat to your Civilization

StringTable.Label: TrainCelebrity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Recruits a Celebrity to join your Civilization.

StringTable.Label: TrainLegion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Trains a legion of soldiers for your Civilization.

StringTable.Label: StationGarrisonProject_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Permanently Stations one Legion to the defense of this planet.
